file_content.text: Corellia is worth fighting for. I just wish the Empire and Councillor Torvix didn't feel the same way.
We're not soldiers, Dakron. CorSec can't handle heavy artillery or stealthed attacks. We need more backup from the Republic.
Every man I have is either out in the field or in the infirmary. Who knows what'll sink us first--Torvix, the Empire or the radiation poisoning.
I'll tell you what'll sink us: all the excuses. Look at us! Losing to some ex-politician and his band of Corona scum--
What now? Have we lost another sector? Run out of supplies? Looking for your pet gizka?
We're looking for Sal Dakron. Agent Carhart sent us to help.
A whole squad, huh? Looks like he understands the situation, at least.
I'm looking for Sal Dakron. Agent Carhart sent me to help.
Well, let's hope you're tough. We've lost too many Green Jedi already.
You're in luck, Dakron. Havoc Squad's worth a thousand of my men.
A privateer. Wonderful. At least you're working for us and not Torvix.
Welcome to the Black Hole. We're low on power cells, rations and just about everything else. I needed reinforcements yesterday, but better late than never.
I'm not leaving until the Black Hole belongs to the Republic.
I'm here to win.
Not leaving alive, anyway. But I'm glad to hear it.
As long as we remain focused on our goal, we cannot fail.
Just stay positive.
Right. Focus. I'll try to work on that, Master Jedi.
I guess that takes care of the status report.
It's bad, I get it.
Let's just say you're a sight for sore eyes, Major. And sore bodies.
You're going to pop a blood vessel if you keep this up.
Calm down, buddy.
You're probably right. I feel ten years older already.
You're in command. Just tell me where I'm needed.
Where do I start?
You're needed everywhere. Between Torvix at our front and the Empire at our backs, we've got our hands full just holding the area.
Show a little respect, or your reinforcements are leaving.
I don't need this.
I'm sorry. I'm glad you've come. Really. We need the help now more than ever.
Take a look around, see who's calling for volunteers. Blast anyone who's not CorSec or Republic, and avoid the radiation. Good luck.
What do I look like, a tour guide? Get in the field or get out of my way.
